properties.name: productId
properties.description: Identifier for the package from which this content is offered

properties.name: contentId
properties.description: Identifier for the content to purchase. Relevant only if Product type = PPV

properties.name: productType
properties.description: Package type. Possible values: PPV, Subscription, Collection

properties.name: receiptId
properties.description: A unique identifier that was provided by the In-App billing service to validate the purchase

properties.name: paymentGatewayName
properties.description: The payment gateway name for the In-App billing service to be used. Possible values: Google/Apple

description: Verifies PPV/Subscription/Collection client purchase (such as InApp) and entitles the user.
